casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Jacob Mark SPIVEY. No. 143PA15-1. Supreme Court of North Carolina. Aug. 25, 2015. W. Michael Spivey, Rocky Mount, for Spivey, Jacob Mark. Brent Kiziah, Assistant Attorney General, for State of North Carolina. Staples S. Hughes, Durham, for Spivey, Jacob Mark. Ben R. David, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

Opinion

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 24th of August 2015 by Appellate Defender for Appointment of the Office of the Appellate Defender to Represent Jacob Mark Spivey as Appellee:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 25th of August 2015."
